name: Present Simple
examples: I read the news every morning.

name: Present Continuous
usage: Actions happening now or temporary situations
examples: She is preparing for the IELTS speaking test.
They are staying in Dhaka this week.

name: Present Perfect
usage: Experiences or actions with present relevance
examples: I have completed two GRE mock tests.
He has improved his listening score.

name: Past Simple
examples: We watched a TOEFL lecture last night.

name: Past Continuous
usage: Past actions in progress when another action occurred
examples: I was reviewing vocabulary when you called.
They were discussing task 2 topics all evening.

name: Future Simple
usage: Decisions made now or future predictions
examples: I will practice speaking for 15 minutes tonight.
The exam will start at 9 AM.
